https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2z5h3nwM0lZhG2Ig12P9FfYy24D.jpg Green meadows, blue sky in Swabia: Actually, the world of the two villages Oberrieslingen and Unterrieslingen should be in perfect order. But she is not. Why? Because the two hostile villages have had to share a church and a cemetery since the Middle Ages, which has caused squabbles and squalor to this day. Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf
